# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a new orientation tracking configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

To use the configuration in an AR session, pass it to the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession] [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/run(_:options:)] method.
title: init()
